mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Hotel Vista del Arroyo (Pasadena, Calif.). East annex. Alterations

Alterations, east annex, Hotel Vista del Arroyo, Pasadena, California., 3" & 1/2" scale & full size details -- fence on south of annex in elevation and section ; section through sun room ; F.S. details new finish in annex & bungalow -- P.M. in bungalow, side casings, base of moulding ; 1 1/2" detail of cornice ; elevation of openings between bedrooms & sun rooms (some omit side 1ts., see plan for other arrangements) ; section through closet no. 2, section through closet no. 1, elevation of closet showing style old finish ; section thro' closet doors ; casement window sill ; F.S. sash door section ; 9.

mods:mods.mods:note: Gift of Jean Murray Bangs (Mrs. Harwell Hamilton Harris), 1960; formerly the collection of Charles Sumner Greene.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Greene & Greene architectural records and papers

mods:location.mods:physicalLocation: Avery Architectural & Fine Arts Library, Columbia University

mods:recordInfo.mods:recordOrigin: Cataloging by project AVIADOR staff, edited to conform to MODS, version 3.4.
